1.0.name: wordpress/wizpert-button-to-share-your-expertise
1.0.description:
Would you like to share your expertise? And talk?

At Wizpert, we are building a community of helpful and caring Wizperts, each knowledgeable in one of our many topics like parenting, relationships or nutrition.

Place a Wizpert Button on your blog to
* tell your fans you are one of our valued experts
* let your readers talk to you real-time, when you are available
* share your knowledge and help your visitors and fans
* make money as one of our highly-rated experts (we take care of all billing)

Join the Wizpert family by creating your free profile, and share your expertise with all users of the Wizpert platform. We will match users to you based on your profile, anytime you are available for calls.

Check out our website, or contact us at in
